Thanks to Secretlab for being the title sponsor of LMG Clips this year! Check out their ergonomic gaming chairs at the link above. Your back will thank you!

Check out Dell laptops at: https://lmg.gg/dellprowanclips

Read the article from The Star: https://www.thestar.com.my/tech/tech-news/2025/06/30/with-a-push-notification-about-039f1-the-movie039-apple-did-what-no-company-should-ever-do

Apple sent out a push notification to iPhone users promoting F1 tickets through the Wallet app. Linus and Luke discuss why this move isn’t just annoying, but deeply hypocritical coming from a company that built its brand on privacy, trust, and being “not like the others.”

Watch the full WAN Show: https://www.youtube.com/live/9KGB4JnqZr8

title: Apple Just Proved They're No Different Than Google

The “Stop Killing Games” petition has crossed 1 million signatures, pushing the EU to consider legislation that could force game publishers to properly sunset online games. Linus and Luke discuss the challenges, why it matters, and what a good sunsetting model could look like.

Watch the full WAN Show: https://www.youtube.com/live/9KGB4JnqZr8
